abstract: Nascar will allow Kurt Busch to continue racing as it waits to see whether he is charged with domestic assault following investigation into confrontation with his ex-girlfriend Patricia Driscoll.
lead_paragraph: Busch, sponsors, officials and fans are all awaiting word regarding whether he will be charged, but Nascar is allowing him to continue racing without penalty in the meantime.
snippet: Busch, sponsors, officials and fans are all awaiting word regarding whether he will be charged, but Nascar is allowing him to continue racing without penalty in the meantime.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: Kurt Busch Sticks With Business Plan Amid Domestic Assault Case
headline.print_headline: Amid Assault Case, Driver Sticks With Business Plan
